law.catch_line: Rental vehicle agent may not handle insurance that is not sold in conjunction with rental vehicle transaction.
law.text: A rental vehicle agent who is licensed in accordance with this subtitle shall not sell, solicit, or negotiate insurance that is not sold in conjunction with a rental vehicle transaction.
law.history: Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 380, sec. 27, effective July 14, 2000.
